mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (ADDRESS, ID, PASSWORD, GENDER, EMAIL, NAME, BIRTH, PROFILE_PICTURE, ISSALESMANAGER) VALUES (#{address}, #{id}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{profilePicture, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSalesManager})
mapper.update: UPDATE Member SET NAME = #{name}, ADDRESS = #{address} WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE Member SET profile_picture = #{profilePicture} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE Member SET profile_picture = NULL WHERE id = #{id}
